name: Voir
description:
VOIR is a RE-inspired narrative thriller about a blind man's journey to find out what happened to his missing girlfriend.

Surrounded by darkness with no one else, can you escape from the house and find your beloved girlfriend?

How to play: in this game, players will play as a visually impaired man, you can perceive surrounding environment by controlling the characters to move around. The game are also designed with battle and collection system, allowing you to experience intense battles experiences while immersing in the rich contents. What are the answers to all these puzzles? Let's take an adventure and find out together !

  1. It is dark! you can see the dark world and challenge your new gaming techniques.
  2. It is intriguing! Players can only feel very weak light spot, and the cold and warm are intertwined, impressing you with unforgettable gaming experience
